description:
Cosette transformed into the Musicart named Destiny. Destiny proclaims that her mission is to eliminate the D2s. Destiny bestows a conductor`s baton upon Takt, and he uses his Conductor powers for the first time. And then, they are confronted by two individuals: Lenny and Titan. They are an official Conductor and Musicart from the New York Symphonica, which was the strategic headquarters to fight the D2s.
Source: crunchyroll
